$interpreted: Adelaide: I'll slaughter you myself, Angelia...!
Adelaide: (Unforgiveable... If Grandfather Sdorica were here, he'd never let these monsters run riot all over the place...)
Adelaide: (Yes, this is all Vendacti's fault—)
Adelaide: (...Dirty, thieving blood, stealing the name of the sinner—I'll burn them all!)
Adelaide: I'll show you... the pain of losing Grandfather Sdorica...
Adelaide: *pant*... Ugh...
Lord Serafin: Second Parhelion...!
Lord Serafin: How could you go back on your word... You promised not to endanger Adelaide's life! You know... You know very well that her body cannot handle all your strength—
Adelaide: Shut your mouth...!!
Adelaide: I promised to Grandfather Sdorica... long, long ago...
Adelaide: I'd never... ever... let anyone get away with harming him...
Angelia: ...You've lived for far too long already. All flowers must wilt eventually... and so must hatred, too.
Adelaide: ...Have I... broken my word... again...?
Zola: Second... Parhelion... y-you can't...
Lord Serafin: —Adelaide!!!
Panicking Soldier: Gwaaagh!!!
Flurried Soldier: S... Save us...
Angelia: (...I'm sorry...)
Lord Serafin: Adelaide... ugh...
Angelia: (I'm... I'm not the same Angelia who'd stop for the sake of a few hostages, not anymore.)
Helpless Soldier: No! I don't want to die, not here!
Zola: Guh... Dammit, they're all dead, Second Parhelion... Serafin... They're all dead...
Zola: You're the only one left... Carlos...
Hyde: ...Ha... Ahaha, hahahaha... I see, I see...
Hyde: Have I been walking into a situation of my own making, from the very beginning...? Ahaha...
Sun Soldier: ...Princess...
Sun Soldier: ...Why...? You... You were our... princess...
Sun Soldier: How... could you do this...
Angelia: ...I-I... I'm sorry...
Sun Soldier: ...This is all... your fault... Princess... An...ge...lia...

Model.Text: (Unforgiveable... If Grandfather Sdorica were here, he'd never let these monsters run riot all over the place...)

I promised to Grandfather Sdorica... long, long ago...
I'd never... ever... let anyone get away with harming him...
...You've lived for far too long already. All flowers must wilt eventually... and so must hatred, too.
(I'm... I'm not the same Angelia who'd stop for the sake of a few hostages, not anymore.)
No! I don't want to die, not here!
Guh... Dammit, they're all dead, Second Parhelion... Serafin... They're all dead...
You're the only one left... Carlos...
...Ha... Ahaha, hahahaha... I see, I see...
Have I been walking into a situation of my own making, from the very beginning...? Ahaha...
...This is all... your fault... Princess... An...ge...lia...
